title: An Evening with Charles Aznavour
creator_credit: VCL Communications, Phillip Goodhand, Patrick Shart and Mike Mansfield
brief_description: This is a video-taped program of the internationally acclaimed French singer/actor, Charles Aznavour, performing live at the Duke of York’s Theatre, London in 1982. The charming and entertaining Aznavour performs a selection of his popular songs accompanied by The Wren Orchestra, and vocal accompaniment from Sue Martin, Val Stokes and Lavinia Rogers. Musical direction by Peter Lee.
